com.strongloop.android.remoting

Class Repository<T extends VirtualObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strongloop.android.remoting.Repository<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestRepository

    public class Repository<T extends VirtualObject>
extends java.lang.Object
    A local representative of remote model repository, it provides access to static methods like 
    User.findById()
    .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Repository(java.lang.String className)
      Creates a new Repository, associating it with the named remote class.
      Repository(java.lang.String className, java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
      Creates a new Repository, associating it with the named remote class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createObject(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> creationParameters)
      Creates a new VirtualObject as a virtual instance of this remote class.
      Adapter getAdapter()
      Gets the Adapter that should be used for invoking methods, both for static methods on this prototype and all methods on all instances of this prototype.
      java.lang.String getClassName()
      Gets the name given to this prototype on the server.
      void invokeStaticMethod(java.lang.String method, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> parameters, Adapter.BinaryCallback callback)
      Invokes a remotable method exposed statically within this class on the server, parses the response as binary data.
      void invokeStaticMethod(java.lang.String method, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> parameters, Adapter.Callback callback)
      Invokes a remotable method exposed statically within this class on the server.

      Sets the Adapter that should be used for invoking methods, both for static methods on this prototype and all methods on all instances of this prototype.

      • invokeStaticMethod

        public void invokeStaticMethod(java.lang.String method,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> parameters,
                      Adapter.Callback callback)
        Invokes a remotable method exposed statically within this class on the server.
        Parameters:
        method - The method to invoke (without the class name), e.g. "doSomething".
        parameters - The parameters to invoke with.
        callback - The callback to invoke when the execution finishes.
        See Also:
        Adapter.invokeStaticMethod(String, Map, com.strongloop.android.remoting.adapters.Adapter.Callback)

      • invokeStaticMethod

        public void invokeStaticMethod(java.lang.String method,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> parameters,
                      Adapter.BinaryCallback callback)
        Invokes a remotable method exposed statically within this class on the server, parses the response as binary data.
        Parameters:
        method - The method to invoke (without the class name), e.g. "doSomething".
        parameters - The parameters to invoke with.
        callback - The callback to invoke when the execution finishes.
        See Also:
        Adapter.invokeStaticMethod(String, Map, com.strongloop.android.remoting.adapters.Adapter.Callback)
